question: In 1818 Brahmo Samaj founder Rammohan Roy wrote a dissertation on meaning and importance of ________?
explanation: In the year 1827 Brahmo Samaj founder Rammohan Roy wrote a dissertation on meaning and importance on the Gayatri mantra. He suggested a Brahmin to always chant om at the beginning and end of the Gayatri mantra. The Gayatri mantra was used for private devotion from 1830 for those who adhered to the philosophy of Brahmo Samaj.
